com.jme3.bullet

Class SolverMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.bullet.SolverMode

  • public final class SolverMode
extends java.lang.Object
    Named mode bits for contact-and-constraint solvers, based on btSolverMode.
    See Also:
    SolverInfo.setMode(int)
